description.zh-cn: 台湾当代乡土文学作家。创作文类以小说为主，旁及散文、诗、儿童文学、戏剧等，其作品曾被翻译为多种语言，并因其在台湾电影新浪潮时期的重要性而被改编为多部电影。
description.en: A contemporary Taiwanese writer of Nativist Literature. His works, primarily novels but also including essays, poetry, children's literature, and plays, have been translated into multiple languages and adapted into several films, playing a significant role in the Taiwan New Wave cinema movement.

description.zh-cn: 黄春明的妻子，曾为中国广播公司同事。
description.en: Wife of Huang Chunming and a former colleague at the Broadcasting Corporation of China.

description.zh-cn: 台湾作家，黄春明的次子，于2003年自杀身亡。
description.en: Taiwanese writer and the second son of Huang Chunming, who committed suicide in 2003.

description.zh-cn: 黄春明的长子。
description.en: The eldest son of Huang Chunming.

description.zh-cn: 黄春明在罗东中学时的国文老师，对其文学创作产生启蒙影响，后被中国国民党指控为赤色分子并遭枪毙。
description.en: Huang Chunming's Chinese literature teacher at Luodong Junior High School, who was a key mentor for his literary pursuits. She was later accused by the Kuomintang of being a communist and was executed.

description.zh-cn: 俄国小说家与戏剧家，其作品经由王贤春老师推荐给黄春明阅读。
description.en: Russian playwright and short-story writer whose works were recommended to Huang Chunming by his teacher, Wang Xianchun.

description.zh-cn: 中国作家，其作品经由王贤春老师推荐给黄春明阅读。
description.en: Chinese writer whose works were recommended to Huang Chunming by his teacher, Wang Xianchun.

description.zh-cn: 中国作家，其作品经由王贤春老师推荐给黄春明阅读。
description.en: Chinese writer whose works were recommended to Huang Chunming by his teacher, Wang Xianchun.

description.zh-cn: 台湾作家、编辑，时任联合报副刊主编，曾大力提携黄春明进入文坛。
description.en: Taiwanese writer and editor, who as the editor of the United Daily News literary supplement, greatly supported Huang Chunming's entry into the literary scene.

description.zh-cn: 台湾编剧、导演、作家，曾为多部改编自黄春明小说的电影担任编剧。
description.en: Taiwanese screenwriter, director, and writer who scripted several film adaptations of Huang Chunming's novels.

description.zh-cn: 台湾电影导演，台湾电影新浪潮的代表人物之一，曾执导改编自黄春明小说的电影《儿子的大玩偶》。
description.en: A leading figure in Taiwan New Wave cinema, this Taiwanese film director directed 'The Sandwich Man,' a film based on Huang Chunming's novel.

description.zh-cn: 国立成功大学台湾文学系副教授，因在黄春明演讲中抗议其未使用台语文创作而引发“台语文事件”，并对黄春明提起公然侮辱诉讼。
description.en: An associate professor in the Department of Taiwanese Literature at National Cheng Kung University, who initiated the 'Taiwanese Language Incident' by protesting Huang Chunming's use of Mandarin in his writing during a lecture, which led to him filing a public insult lawsuit against Huang.

description.zh-cn: 连接台北与宜兰的高速公路，黄春明曾因环保原因反对其兴建。
description.en: An expressway connecting Taipei and Yilan, the construction of which was opposed by Huang Chunming on environmental grounds.

description.zh-cn: 计划连接苏澳与花莲的高速公路，黄春明曾因环保原因反对其兴建。
description.en: A planned expressway to connect Su'ao and Hualien, the construction of which was opposed by Huang Chunming on environmental grounds.

description.zh-cn: 一种着重于描绘乡土社会和人民生活的文学运动，黄春明是其代表作家之一。
description.en: A literary movement focusing on the depiction of rural society and the lives of its people, of which Huang Chunming is a representative author.

description.zh-cn: 在经历多次退学后，最终于1958年自屏东师范学校毕业。
description.en: After being expelled from several schools, he finally graduated from Pingtung Normal School in 1958.

description.zh-cn: 黄春明被普遍公认为台湾当代重要的乡土小说家，其作品深刻描绘了兰阳平原的农村生活，极大地推动了乡土文学的发展。
description.en: Huang Chunming is widely regarded as a major contemporary Nativist novelist in Taiwan. His works, which vividly depict rural life on the Lanyang Plain, have significantly advanced the development of Nativist literature.

description.zh-cn: 王贤春是黄春明在罗东中学时的文学启蒙老师，她鼓励黄春明创作，并向他推荐了契诃夫、沈从文和巴金等作家的作品。
description.en: Wang Xianchun was Huang Chunming's literary mentor at Luodong Junior High School. She encouraged his writing and recommended works by authors such as Chekhov, Shen Congwen, and Ba Jin.

description.zh-cn: 王贤春后遭到中国国民党指控为赤色分子，被拘捕并枪毙。
description.en: Wang Xianchun was later accused by the Kuomintang of being a communist, arrested, and executed.

description.zh-cn: 其作品经由王贤春老师推荐给黄春明阅读，对其早期创作产生影响。
description.en: His works were recommended to Huang Chunming by his teacher Wang Xianchun, influencing his early writing.

description.zh-cn: 其作品经由王贤春老师推荐给黄春明阅读，对其早期创作产生影响。
description.en: His works were recommended to Huang Chunming by his teacher Wang Xianchun, influencing his early writing.

description.zh-cn: 其作品经由王贤春老师推荐给黄春明阅读，对其早期创作产生影响。
description.en: His works were recommended to Huang Chunming by his teacher Wang Xianchun, influencing his early writing.

description.zh-cn: 黄春明在救国团《幼狮通讯》上发表了第一篇小说《清道伕的孩子》，正式开始其写作生涯。
description.en: Huang Chunming began his official writing career by publishing his first short story, 'The Scavenger's Child,' in the China Youth Corps' 'Youth Lions Correspondence'.

description.zh-cn: 在担任联合报副刊主编期间，大力提携黄春明，使其得以进入文坛。
description.en: As the editor of the United Daily News literary supplement, she strongly supported Huang Chunming, enabling his entry into the literary world.

description.zh-cn: 其多部小说在1980年代被改编成电影，这些作品成为台湾电影新浪潮时期的重要组成部分。
description.en: Several of his novels were adapted into films in the 1980s, and these works became important components of the Taiwan New Wave cinema movement.

description.zh-cn: 侯孝贤执导了根据黄春明小说改编的三段式电影《儿子的大玩偶》中的一段。
description.en: Hou Hsiao-hsien directed one segment of the anthology film 'The Sandwich Man,' which was based on Huang Chunming's novels.

description.zh-cn: 吴念真为多部改编自黄春明小说的电影撰写剧本，包括《儿子的大玩偶》和《两个油漆匠》。
description.en: Wu Nien-jen wrote the screenplays for several films adapted from Huang Chunming's novels, including 'The Sandwich Man' and 'The Two Painters'.

description.zh-cn: 为抢救本土文化，黄春明在家乡宜兰创立了吉祥巷工作室。
description.en: To preserve local culture, Huang Chunming founded the Jixiang Lane Workshop in his hometown of Yilan.

description.zh-cn: 佛光大学于2008年颁授黄春明荣誉文学博士学位。
description.en: Fo Guang University awarded Huang Chunming an honorary Doctor of Letters degree in 2008.

description.zh-cn: 国立台湾大学于2022年11月15日授予黄春明名誉博士学位。
description.en: National Taiwan University conferred an honorary doctorate upon Huang Chunming on November 15, 2022.

description.zh-cn: 在黄春明演讲期间，蒋为文高举海报抗议其未使用台语文创作，引发激烈言语冲突，并后续提起诉讼。
description.en: During a lecture by Huang Chunming, Chiang Wei-wen held up a poster to protest his non-use of the Taiwanese language, leading to a heated verbal conflict and a subsequent lawsuit.

description.zh-cn: 在与黄春明发生“台语文事件”冲突后，蒋为文以公然侮辱罪控告黄春明。
description.en: Following the 'Taiwanese Language Incident' conflict with Huang Chunming, Chiang Wei-wen sued Huang for public insult.

description.zh-cn: 黄春明以环保为由，反对兴建北宜高速公路。
description.en: Huang Chunming opposed the construction of the Taipei-Yilan Expressway on environmental grounds.

description.zh-cn: 黄春明以环保为由，反对兴建苏花高速公路。
description.en: Huang Chunming opposed the construction of the Suao-Hualien Expressway on environmental grounds.
